Hero.p: I have a degree in Information Systems and knowledge in UX and UI Design. These knowledge combined allow me to create digital experiences that are both aesthetically pleasing and easy to use.

About.subtitle: Front-end developer
About.p: A dedicated professional with a Bachelor's degree in Information Systems from the Federal University of Alagoas. As a Front-end Developer, I bring experience in creating intuitive interfaces by combining knowledge of Visual Design and User Experience Design (UX Design). Committed to delivering high-quality code and solving problems effectively.
